description: Try our easy to follow Olive Oil Hollandaise recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
keywords: Sauce & condiment,Pescatarian,Seafood free,Gluten free,Tree nut free,Sesame free,Halal,Soy free,Wheat free,Vegetarian,Dairy free,Peanut free
name: Olive Oil Hollandaise Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Place egg yolk and lemon juice in a heatproof bowl over a pan of simmering water, ensuring the bowl doesnâ€™t touch the water. Whisk for 4-5 minutes or until light and fluffy. Gradually add oil, 1 tbs at a time, whisking continually until mixture thickens. Remove from heat, season and set aside.
Serve over cooked meat, fish, eggs or steamed vegetables.
